allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive documentation and test files

- Add COMPLETE_FRONTEND_CODE.md: Full frontend code documentation with all components
- Add WORKFLOW_TEST_REPORT.md: Comprehensive system testing report with workflow verification
- Add FRONTEND_COMPLETE_CODE.md: Additional frontend documentation
- Add test_verdict.txt: Sample legal verdict for testing
- Update frontend package-lock.json: Latest dependency versions

Documentation includes:
- Complete React/TypeScript frontend code
- All 9 page components \(Dashboard, Upload, Verdicts, Articles, WordPress, Publishing\)
- API client with all endpoints
- TypeScript types and interfaces
- Configuration files \(Vite, Tailwind, TypeScript\)
- Comprehensive workflow testing results
- Verified anonymization, analysis, and article generation with real Anthropic API

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
